properties.name: argon2-parameters.salt-length
properties.description: Size of the salt used for encryption (in characters).

properties.name: argon2-parameters.hash-length
properties.description: Size of the hash used for encryption (in characters).

properties.name: argon2-parameters.parallelism
properties.description: Number of cores to use for encrypting the hash.

properties.name: argon2-parameters.memory
properties.description: Amount of memory used for encrypting.

properties.name: argon2-parameters.iterations
properties.description: Number of times the hash function gets called recursively.

properties.name: server.location
properties.description: Location of current back-end for redirects.
